title: Border, 1850â1900
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: needle lace with ground of loop & twist with loop & twist return
dimensions:

creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Border of Point d'Gaze in a design of foliated forms and medallions in symmetric patterned surmounted by repeat design of oval wreaths terminating in floral sprays.
